about_the_game:
Game Overview

“Mortal Frame: Reforged in Survival” is a sci-fi RPG combining open-world exploration and sandbox survival. Set in a future shaped by rapid technological advancements, breakthroughs in bioengineering and artificial intelligence present humanity with profound survival challenges and moral dilemmas. Players will explore a mysterious, uncharted island, gathering resources, crafting equipment, capturing AI companions, encountering diverse factions, and enhancing themselves through modifications to face increasingly powerful foes while unraveling the mysteries hidden within.

Body Modifications

Players can explore to collect materials, enhancing or repairing their implanted modification modules to unlock new traits or increase their strength.

           

     

Robot Companions

Players can defeat enemies or salvage various types of robot wreckage, converting them into loyal robotic companions through repair.

Factions

The game is populated with various factions, each boasting unique stories. Players can delve into their backstory, acquire their technologies and gear, and enjoy a breadth of options and adventures.

Rich Weapons and Equipment

The game boasts an arsenal of over 160 weapons and items for players to gather and craft, arming them with an array of combat choices.

     

Fully Dynamic Climate and Environmental Interaction

The game delivers shifting seasons, weather patterns, and robust environmental interaction. Players have the power to alter landscapes and tailor the hues of flora across the seasons, crafting a world that reflects their vision.

     

Deep Seasonal Cycles

 Beyond mere visual spectacle, seasonal transitions imbue the game with additional depth. Each rotation introduces distinct challenges and tactics, offering players a multiplicity of gameplay experiences and quests. Each turn of the seasons presents a fresh challenge.

Sandbox Survival

The game fuses quintessential sandbox survival elements, offering freedom and limitless gameplay possibilities.

     

     

Note

: The game is in development. Art, style, and features may change. Future updates will improve details. Thank you for your support!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450, AMD FX-8120, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970, RX 570, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio

  • OS: Windows 11 64bit or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K, Ryzen 5 5600X , or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060, RX 6600 XT, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
